long_description: The Petzl Tactikka Plus RGB Headlamp delivers Constant Lighting technology for consistently bright light, along with modes that promote discretion and preserve your night vision. Wide, uniform floodlight mode is ideal for close-range vision. Focused spotlight mode lets you see where you're going when you move around. 3 colored LED lighting modes (red, green and blue) let you remain discreet and help preserve your night vision. Constant Lighting technology ensures that brightness remains steady as the batteries are drained. Strobe mode; boost mode for on-demand brightness of 140 lumens (60m beam distance). The Petzl Tactikka Plus RGB Headlamp features an elastic headband that adjusts easily with a simple buckle.
short_description: The Petzl Tactikka Plus RGB Headlamp delivers Constant Lighting technology for consistently bright light, along with modes that promote discretion and preserve your night vision.
